citation.title: Switzerland braces for Alpine lake tsunami.

news.title: Switzerland braces for Alpine lake tsunami
news.summary: Authorities in Swiss canton blaze a trail by factoring the risk into hazard planning.

news.title: Swiss Warn of Alpine Lake Tsunami Threat to 13 Million People
news.summary: Swiss authorities are investigating the threat of Alpine lake tsunamis to people living nearby and are to include them in their hazard plans – the first time a threat of this kind has been officially recognised. A number of researchers have studied alpine

news.title: Switzerland Could Be Vulnerable to an Alpine Lake Tsunami
news.summary: A danger is lurking in the bucolic mountains of Switzerland: the alpine lake tsunami . Yes, it's a real thing, and yes, it has happened before—many times,according to unsettling new geological research . Read more...

news.title: Landlocked Switzerland Threatened by Tsunamis
news.summary: Switzerland's lakes produced devastating tsunamis in the past, raising worries that 13 million people may be at risk. Continue reading →

news.title: Officials preparing risk assessment for alpine lake tsunami in Switzerland
news.summary: Officials in Nidwalden Canton in Switzerland have announced that they have commissioned a study to look into the threat posed by a tsunami in Lake Lucerne—a first for a European alpine region. The study, to be conducted by University of Bern geologist Flav

news.title: Rare Weather Patterns Can Trigger Tsunamis
news.summary: Alex Berezow, RCSci. The deadliest tsunami in world history struck southeast Asia on Boxing Day 2004 following a behemoth 9.1-magnitude temblor. Several years later, in March 2011, another tsunami hit Japan, again following a 9.0-magnitude quake. It is not
